alert.note: Alert for Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 16 at 2:59PM EDT until August 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bonifay, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Bradford, Wausau, Brock Crossroad, Chipley Municipal Airport, Orange Hill, Whitehead Crossroads, Five Points, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Sunny Hills, Poplar Head, Sylvania and Johnson Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
